title: If anyone wins this Huggins and Scott auction in July, I’m interested in three cards
author: Howe’s Hunter

posts.post_title: If anyone wins this Huggins and Scott auction in July, I’m interested in three cards
posts.post_content:
[url]https://www.hugginsandscott.com/cgi-bin/showitem.pl?itemid=71228[/url]

Nice of them to use my Net54 name as the first two words in the description (he says sarcastically)

Anyway, it doesn’t start for several weeks yet, but if anyone here wins, there are thre of the cards in the lot I would like to get my hands on. More than happy to pay 3/40s plus premium of the lot, then postage to get them. Thanks.
